    • killGame

      public void killGame​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Called by the Controller when a game is ended. Disconnect all the player in game with nickname calling Server.killLobby(String nickname)
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player to disconnect

    • goCommitDie

      public void goCommitDie​(java.lang.String playerToKill)
      Called by the Controller when a player lose in a three player game and the game continue. Close the connection of playerToKill and call Server.looserDisconnect(String playerToKill)
      Parameters:
      playerToKill - the player to disconnect from the server

    • killPinger

      public void killPinger()
      Cancels the scheduled ping runnable (created in pinger()) using its ScheduledFuture and also shuts down the ScheduledExecutorService

      killPinger in interface Pinger
